whatTheyOffer: They know that overcoming the effects of domestic violence is a lifelong process, and they are here to help at every step of the journey. The newly reopened Riley Center Community Office offers drop-in support services to all survivors of domestic violence, including former residents of Rosalie and Brennan Houses. Services include Individual Case Management, Support Groups, Advocacy, Community Building, Peer Counseling, Program Information and Referrals
